job.title: Software Development Engineer in Test(SDET)
job.description:
4+ years of experience with functional testing
2+ years of experience testing complex B2B or consumer facing applications
2+ years of experience testing backend REST services,
1+ years of experience building robust test automation suites
1+ years of experience in Selenium or other GUI automation tools.
2+ years working experience under Agile methodology.
Experience building CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins/ or similar tools.
Knowledgeable in best practices for functional test strategy.
Able to take the initiative and drive change.
Strong leadership identity.
Excellent verbal and written communication.
Great team collaboration skills.
Experience with AWS technologies
